name: Understaffed (Deor)
description:
Welcome to Walter Burger, New Employee!

Today is your first day on the job at your local burger joint and the lunch rush just hit, but none of your coworkers are anywhere to be found! Use what little training you have to satisfy your picky customers as long as possible.

How to Play
  • The screen is separated into 3 main sections:
    • The Kitchen
      • Contains the workstations you'll use to build your
    • The Burger Visualizer
      • Shows the burger you're currently working on.
    • The Order Ticker
      • Shows the orders currently available to send out.
      • If an order takes too long to arrive the customer will get fed up and leave.
  • On the top of the screen is the Satisfaction Bar
    • This bar goes down every time you make a mistake on an order or fail to send out an order in time.
    • If customer satisfaction goes to 0, it's game over.
Controls
  • WASD:  Move around the kitchen.
  • SPACE:  Start a new order.
  • ARROWs:  Use workstations.
Tips and Tricks
  • Be sure the items on your burger are in the right order. Customers care about that kind of thing!
  • Larger orders are worth more points and also penalize more if they're missed.
  • Customers will be less satisfied after thirty seconds and fed up after one minute.
  • Customers will be more unhappy about getting no food than getting the wrong food, so keep those orders flowing!
Credits

Made by Nathan Lockwood and Zach Reiter for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6
